Title: Tournament Announcement
Content: Join our monthly tournament starting next week! Great prizes await the winners. Check the Discord for more details.

Title: New Character Classes Available
Content: Three new character classes have been added to the game! Try out the Mage, Warrior, and Archer with unique abilities.

Title: Community Event This Weekend
Content: Join us for a special weekend event with double XP, rare item drops, and exclusive rewards!
